resources.string: <font color=#757575>To enable and see your current location, navigate to Settings > Apps > GeoBus > Permissions.

CAMPUS LOOP
Weekdays
Loop shuttles usually run every 10 minutes or less until 6pm, and every 10-20 minutes after 6pm.

CW:
First run departs Barn Theater at 7:25am.
Last run departs Barn Theater at 11:00pm.

CCW:
First run departs Main Entrance at 7:25am.
Last run departs Main Entrance at 11:30pm.

Weekends
CW:
First run departs Barn Theater at 6:10pm.
Last run Saturday departs Barn Theater at 10:40pm.
Last run Sunday departs Barn Theater at 11:30pm.

CCW:
First run departs Main entrance at 6:00pm.
Last run Saturday departs Main Entrance at 10:40pm.
Last run Sunday departs Main Entrance at 11:20pm.

UPPER CAMPUS
Weekdays
Upper campus shuttles travel between East and West Remote parking lots every 15 minutes.

Departs East and West Remote lots every 15 minutes, 7:40am-7:55pm (at :40, :55, :10, and :25 after the hour).

Final West Remote departure at 8:10pm on Tuesdays and Thursdays.

EAST NIGHT CORE
Weekdays
Additional lines continue every 30 minutes after the initial run until midnight.
Quarry Plaza:       7:00pm … 11:30pm 12:00am
East Remote:       7:02pm … 11:32pm 12:02am
Crown Circle:       7:06pm … 11:36pm 12:06am (end)
Science Hill:         7:09pm … 11:39pm
West Remote:      7:20pm … 11:50pm
Media Theater:    7:22pm … 11:52pm
McHenry Library: 7:24pm … 11:54pm

Weekends
Same schedule, same end time, but starts 30 minutes earlier at 6:30pm.

WEST NIGHT CORE
Weekdays
Additional lines continue every 30 minutes after the initial run until midnight.
Quarry Plaza:        7:00pm … 11:30pm 12:00am
Music Center:       7:03pm … 11:33pm 12:03am
West Remote:       7:10pm … 11:40pm 12:10am (end)
Kresge Bridge:      7:12pm … 11:42pm
Science Hill:          7:13pm … 11:43pm
Crown Circle:        7:16pm … 11:46pm
Stevenson Circle: 7:20pm … 11:50pm

Weekends
Same schedule, same end time, but starts 30 minutes earlier at 6:30pm.

NIGHT OWL
Night Owl buses pick up and drop off riders on Cathcart at Pacific, next to Old School shoes and across from the University Town Center in downtown Santa Cruz.

Buses stop at all off-campus Metro bus stops along the route, and at Loop bus stops on campus.

Most buses travel through campus in a counterclockwise (east to west) direction; those that travel in a clockwise direction are lsited in italics in the schedule below (note that some on campus stops are served in one direction only).

Night Owl service operates during fall, winter and spring school terms only; a valid UCSC ID must be presented to board.

Tap on Night Owl Schedule from the previous menu to see the schedule.
Why bus when you can GeoBus?
